verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> had laid hold <S%G2902>of<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5087>put<s%> him <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G2266>sake<s%> of <S%G846>Herodias,<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%>'s <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

<S%G2309>When<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> would <S%G2309>have<s%> put him to <S%G615>death,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G2192>counted<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> was <S%G3076>grieved,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3727>sake<s%> of his <S%G2532>oaths,<s%> and of those who sat at the <S%G4873>table<s%> with <S%G2753>him,<s%> he commanded it to be <S%G1325>given,<s%>

<S%G846>His<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> was <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G4094>platter,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to the young <S%G2877>lady:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G5342>brought<s%> it <S%G3384>to<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3384>mother.<s%>

Now <S%G2532>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G402>this,<s%> he withdrew from <S%G1564>there<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2596>a<s%> <S%G4143>boat,<s%> to <S%G2596>a<s%> <S%G2048>deserted<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2398>apart.<s%> <S%G2532>When<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G190>it,<s%> they followed <S%G846>him<s%> on <S%G3979>foot<s%> from the <S%G4172>cities.<s%>

When <S%G3798>evening<s%> had <S%G4334>come,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "This <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2048>deserted,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G3928>is<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G3928>late.<s%> <S%G630>Send<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G630>away,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G59>may<s%> <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>villages,<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1033>food.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> to sit <S%G347>down<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5528>grass;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>the<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2486>the<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fish,<s%> and looking <S%G308>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> he <S%G2127>blessed,<s%> <S%G2806>broke<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> the <S%G740>loaves<s%> <S%G3101>to<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> gave to the <S%G3793>multitudes.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5315>ate,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G5526>filled.<s%> <S%G2532>They<s%> took <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of that which <S%G4052>remained<s%> left over from the broken <S%G2801>pieces.<s%>

<S%G2112>Immediately<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G315>made<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1684>get<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to go <S%G4254>ahead<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the other <S%G4008>side,<s%> <S%G2193>while<s%> <S%G3739>he<s%> <S%G630>sent<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G630>away.<s%>

<S%G2532>After<s%> he had <S%G630>sent<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G630>away,<s%> he went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G2398>himself<s%> to <S%G4336>pray.<s%> <S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G3798>evening<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G928>distressed<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G2949>waves,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1727>contrary.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> they were <S%G5015>troubled,<s%> <S%G3754>saying,<s%> <S%G2076>"It<s%>'s a <S%G5326>ghost!<s%>" <S%G2532>and<s%> they cried <S%G2896>out<s%> <S%G575>for<s%> <S%G5401>fear.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> when he <S%G991>saw<s%> that the <S%G417>wind<s%> was <S%G2478>strong,<s%> he was <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G756>beginning<s%> to <S%G2670>sink,<s%> he <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G3004>out,<s%> saying, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G3165>me!<s%>"

<S%G2112>Immediately<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> stretched <S%G1614>out<s%> his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> took <S%G1949>hold<s%> of <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "You of little <S%G1519>faith,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> did you <S%G1365>doubt?<s%>"
<S%G2532>When<s%> they had crossed <S%G1276>over,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G1082>Gennesaret.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> the <S%G435>people<s%> <S%G1921>of<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G1921>recognized<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they sent <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G4066>surrounding<s%> <S%G2532>region,<s%> and <S%G4374>brought<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> who <S%G2192>were<s%> <S%G2560>sick,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3870>begged<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G680>might<s%> <S%G680>just<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> the <S%G2899>fringe<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garment.<s%> <S%G2532>As<s%> many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G680>touched<s%> it were made <S%G1295>whole.<s%>
